title: Sarah at the Wedding
description: "A sweet addition to Pauline Oud’s collection" - Mom Read It blog Today is a special day. It’s a party. Not just a birthday party, but a really big party… a wedding! Aunt Olivia is getting married to William.Sarah and Ian are flower girl and ring bearer at Aunt Olivia’s wedding. Ian gets to wear a beautiful suit and Sarah got a new dress. They can carry the veil, hold the rings on a beautiful pillow and throw flowers. Will everything go as planned? A heartwarming picture book about a wedding and everything that happens on a special day. For children ages 3 and up.
author: Pauline Oud
